Scene:
The Back Lane at Nagamachi
(Nagamachi ura / 長町裏)

Play: The Summer Festival at Naniwa (夏祭浪花鑑)

Production: May 1976

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)

Takemoto Datejidayū (see also Takemoto Datetayū V) (竹本伊達路大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Kanotarō (鶴澤叶太郎)
